Parameters: SeekBar: The SeekBar in which the touch gesture began
onStopTrackingTouch(android.widget.SeekB.Description: Notification that the user has finished a touch gesture. Clients may want to use this to re-enable advancing the seekbar.

Parameters: SeekBar: The SeekBar in which the touch gesture began
onStartTrackingTouch(android.widget.Seek.Description: Notification that the user has started a touch gesture. Clients may want to use this to disable advancing the seekbar.

Parameters: SeekBar: The SeekBar whose progress has changed

int: The current progress level. This will be in the range min..max where min and max were set by @B_android#widget#ProgressBar#setMin_E@ and @B_android#widget#ProgressBar#setMax_E@, respectively. (The default values for min is 0 and max is 100.)
boolean: True if the progress change was initiated by the user.
onProgressChanged(android.widget.SeekBar.Description: Notification that the progress level has changed. Clients can use the fromUser parameter to distinguish user-initiated changes from those that occurred programmatically.
onProgressChanged(android.widget.SeekBar.FullName: public abstract void onProgressChanged (SeekBar seekBar, int progress, boolean fromUser)

ClassDesc: A callback that notifies clients when the progress level has been changed. This includes changes that were initiated by the user through a touch gesture or arrow key/trackball as well as changes that were initiated programmatically.
